TopShopes is the first largest e-commerce platform in Central Asia headquartered in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan. Fed Inshaat and Textile San. And external Tic.OOO.STI.

TopShopes is a shopping site that has been active since 2022 and is available to everyone. Thanks to the large range of products and services offered, it has become a large market playlist.

There are many categories including cosmetics, fashion, electronics, furniture and home care products. Thanks to new technologies, we are digitizing our trading platform.
Our marketplace brings together thousands of businesses, leading digital transformation, research and development.

We are strengthening our technology company in a constructive way.
Introducing innovations in the e-commerce system in Bishkek.

Welcome to our Topshopes marketplace

topshopes-data:
Welcome to our online marketplace! We are a team of enthusiasts who created this resource to help people find everything they need in one place. Our platform offers a wide range of products and services that can be easily and quickly found using convenient filters and search.

 We are constantly working to improve our service to ensure the most comfortable and safe use. We value each of our clients and are ready to help solve any issues related to our marketplace.

 Join our community and enjoy a wide selection of products and services available on our online marketplace!
